
# Pipe-Operator

Schreibe den folgenden Code mithilfe des Pipe-Operators um: 

```{r}

numbers <- c(-1, -2, -3, -4, -5)
numbers_positive <- abs(numbers)
numbers_sum <- sum(numbers_positive)
print(numbers_sum)

```
